mapper.select: select STUDY_NO as study_no, N_NO as n_no, N_WRITE_DAY as n_write_day, N_WRITER as n_writer, N_TITLE as n_title, N_CONTENT as n_content from s_notice where STUDY_NO = #{value} order by N_NO desc
mapper.insert: insert into s_notice (STUDY_NO, N_NO, N_WRITE_DAY, N_WRITER, N_TITLE, N_CONTENT ) values (#{study_no}, notice_seq.NEXTVAL, sysdate, 'cj', #{n_title}, #{n_content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_notice SET N_CONTENT= #{n_content}, N_TITLE=#{n_title}, N_WRITE_DAY=sysdate WHERE N_NO = #{n_no}
